## Source: amazon-inspector (71d5e12cfb929e029a7fcb5f87399a07fa074d8e30025eb93914120e703f142a)
The package @kyriba/data-frontend was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (599aa6669690e94bbbd25d1e8be62b3bc54e3a2a0c12b7b8cf848b758d842844)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@kyriba/data-frontend' @ 1.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
